subject: p19991135
Findings: In comparison with the study of, the monitoring and support devices remain in place without definite pneumothorax. The left lung remains essentially clear except for some atelectatic changes at the base. Extensive subcutaneous emphysema again persists along the right lateral chest wall. Opacification along the mediastinal border on the right again could reflect collection of pleural fluid. The development of hematoma cannot be excluded in the appropriate clinical setting.
